about_the_game:
BOLO Legends - An Epic Adventure


Story -
Charlotte, who does not have mother as she was born from the forest the only heir to the throne after her father, possess magical power. One day Dark Lord Barota The Sorcerer the most evil wizard put spell on Charlotte and Kidnaps her into his layer of Dark Realm to sacrifice her to his Master Charon. Along His(BOLO) quest to save the princess he gains power from elders of forest one by one and ultimately engage in a fight with the Dark Lord Master Charon.

Features -
Its 2D and 3D Side Scroller Action Adventure Game with Lots of Super Powers, its Colorful, Story Rich, and So Much Fun.
Use intelligence and reflexes with stamina.
11 levels of intense and epic difficulty.
More than 25 achievements.
At least 4h to complete the game at 100%.

Conclusion -
A challenge awaits all who seek it here, whether you are a first-time Player or old, BOLO does not disappoint amazing you with his capabilities, it puzzles, hack and slash combat with a lot of adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home Edition - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 - 4370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home Edition - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3500x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti or AMD RX Vega-56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Do you have what it takes to save a princess from Dark Lord who dares to threaten the whole world by consuming her powers and become threat to everyone's existence, then BOLO Legends is for you. Dont forget to have FUN.
